alert.note: Alert for Issaquena; Sharkey (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 1:16PM CDT until May 11 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MOREHOUSE...EAST CARROLL AND NORTHERN WEST CARROLL PARISHES...NORTHERN WARREN...ISSAQUENA AND SOUTHWESTERN SHARKEY COUNTIES... At 115 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Oak Grove to 6 miles west of Valley Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Onward around 120 PM CDT. Valley Park around 125 PM CDT. Kilbourne around 135 PM CDT. Millikin and Shelburn around 140 PM CDT. Gassoway around 145 PM CDT. Mayersville around 155 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...northeastern Louisiana...and northwestern and west central Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
